146449.name: Drivers of recovery (number of European bird species)
146449.description: The number of European bird species that have seen a significant recovery in their populations in recent decades, categorized by the main driver of their recovery.

display.name: Number of recovered European bird species by driver

146449.datasetName: Drivers of recovery in European bird species (ZSL, 2014)
146449.s_name: Deinet, S., Ieronymidou, C., McRae, L., Burfield, I.J., Foppen, R.P., Collen, B. and Böhm, M. (2013) Wildlife comeback in Europe: The recovery of selected mammal and bird species.

source.name: Deinet, S., Ieronymidou, C., McRae, L., Burfield, I.J., Foppen, R.P., Collen, B. and Böhm, M. (2013) Wildlife comeback in Europe: The recovery of selected mammal and bird species.
source.dataPublishedBy: Deinet, S., Ieronymidou, C., McRae, L., Burfield, I.J., Foppen, R.P., Collen, B. and Böhm, M. (2013) Wildlife comeback in Europe: The recovery of selected mammal and bird species. Final report to Rewilding Europe by ZSL, BirdLife International and the European Bird Census Council. London, UK: ZSL.
